divs: sighting detailsat about 19:00 hours on 02\15\02 my wife and myself were standing in front ofour house in saddlebag lake resort in lake wales, in polk county florida. wewere in the front drive and were looking up into the north\east sky in front ofus. we noticed a bright long tail (at first thought it was an exhaust) withthree bright long orange bars in front of it at an angle. it continued southfor a little while towards us, then it turned to its left (east)and continuedup and away. (not a sweeping turn) as it turned we noticed a big circle in themiddle (silver in color and it seemed to twinkle) with two smaller circles oneach side that seemed to drop from the middle one and form a triangle. thesmaller ones either faded out or went faster out of view. the main one keptcontinuing in an easterly fashion until we couldnt see it anymore. we haveseen rocket launches before, but nothing like this. we have drawn pictures ofwhat we witnessed.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Lake Wales
There were no other sightings in Lake Wales on or around January 15th 2002
